title: Security and Hacking Books Pack
description:
Huge Security and Hacking books Megapack (1.96 GB)


Most are in English but many are in French.

Most are .PDF but many are either ZIPped or RARed with the .pdf (or whatever) in them. There may be just a few duplicates.



I can't get the list to post with the upload (because there's errors when I try) 

- - - - Individual lists are in the folders as.txt files.

If you need a complete list and the .torrent has been deleted just copy and paste the info hash into your favorite search engine and get the .torrent from one of the sites that still hosts .torrent files (many of them list the files, too), then load it and choose what you want from the list. 

(did I really need to point this out?)

But if you're cool you'll take the whole thing and seed it.
